Class CustodyChargeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invoices.service.CustodyChargeService

  • public class CustodyChargeService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is annotated as a service. It is the service bean for the CustodyCharge entity

      • generateCustodyCharge

        public CustodyCharge generateCustodyCharge(java.lang.Float baseValue,
                                           java.lang.Float vatRate,
                                           CustodyCharge custodyCharge)
        Parameters:
        baseValue - The amount of money that the invoice addressee has to pay, without VAT.
        vatRate - The rate of VAT.
        custodyCharge - A CustodyCharge object (new or to be updated).
        Returns:
        The created (or updated) CustodyCharge object.

      • save

        private CustodyCharge save(CustodyCharge custodyCharge)
        Method will insert a record in the "custody_charges" table(or update an existing record).
        Parameters:
        custodyCharge - The CustodyCharge object to 'save'.
        Returns:
        The CustodyCharge object, representing the newly inserted/updated CustodyCharge record.
